message:
The subscription for edu-email-events to ingest mailgun-events is holding old messages.

Runbook: https://joinhandshake.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/DA/pages/2144404005/Runbooks+EDU+Email+Events

If this monitor resolves, we should keep a close eye on the monitor's trend and ensure that messages continued to get acknowledged

@slack-incidents-edu
name: EDU Email Events subscription backed up
